default.title: Fleek | Build and deploy performant apps
default.description: Fleek makes it easy to ship performant apps in minutes. Deploy instantly, run globally, scale automatically.

about.title: About
about.description: Fleek is an open-source cloud platform built on permissionless infrastructure, offering secure, scalable, and censorship-free services for builders. Learn More.

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: Stay updated with blog posts from the Fleek team and community. Explore articles and insights on the latest trends and advancements in web development.

announcements.title: Announcements
announcements.description: Stay informed with the latest announcements from Fleek. Get insights on new features, updates, and company developments.

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.description: Keep track of all the updates and improvements on Fleek. Our changelog provides detailed information about the latest changes to our platform to help you stay ahead.

learn.title: Learn
learn.description: Explore educational content and learning resources on Fleek. Dive into tutorials, case studies, and expert advice to expand your skills and knowledge in web development.

templates.title: Templates
templates.description: Get started quickly with Fleek templates. Explore our collection of boilerplates and templates designed for fast build times and easy deployment.

docs.title: Docs
docs.description: Kickstart your Fleek journey with our documentation, detailed guides and references. Browse our platform resources for a deep dive into our features.

guides.title: Guides
guides.description: Discover step-by-step guides and tutorials on Fleek to streamline your app and web development. Leverage our resources to build smarter, faster, and stress free.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Fleek is an edge-optimized cloud platform. Effortlessly build, ship and scale highly performant apps. Try for free and deploy an app in 5 minutes.

support.title: Support
support.description: Visit the Fleek Support Center for detailed FAQs, troubleshooting guides, and documentation. Quickly report issues or submit support requests to get the help you need.

references.title: References
references.description: Explore the Fleek References page for troubleshooting guides designed to address common errors when using Fleek.

reportSite.title: Report a Site
reportSite.description: Report any site violating Fleek's Terms of Service to help maintain a secure and compliant environment.

submitRequest.title: Submit a Request
submitRequest.description: If you're encountering issues with Fleek's platform, we're here to assist! Please fill out the form with details about your issue to receive help from our support team.

templates.title: Templates - Fleek
templates.description: Use a template to kick start your application. Pick from just a framework or a full web3 starter kit, the possibilities are limitless.

annoucementMarquee.message: Introducing Fleek Machines (Early access): One-click verified and private compute

hero.h1: Build and deploy autonomous apps & AI agents
hero.h2: Fleek makes it easy to build and deploy next-generation apps and AI agents in minutes on an open-source, verifiable, auto-scalable cloud platform.

faq.question: Can I change my payment method at any time?
faq.answer: Yes. You can switch from crypto to credit card payments and any credit top-up model anytime.

faq.question: If I am in a paid/Pro plan, will I still receive the free monthly credits?
faq.answer: Yes, every user receives $5 of credits for free each month, regardless of their account type.

faq.question: What happens if I run out of credits? Will my account be suspended?
faq.answer: You will be notified before and after you run out of credits, and we will only suspend your plan after a notice period. All of your data will be saved and can be easily restored.

faq.question: What if I want to cancel my account?
faq.answer: You can stop adding credits or delete your account at any time without restrictions.

hero.title: About Fleek
subText: Fleek is an open source, trustless cloud platform built on Fleek Network’s next-gen permissionless cloud infrastructure. Picture Cloudflare meets Uber, but more secure, reliable, verifiable, and without the data tampering, price gouging and censorship plaguing Big Cloud.

The result is a high-performance modern cloud platform where builders can run their software and apps with lower costs, enhanced security and privacy, and better guarantees, all while maintaining best in class speed, scalability, and developer experience.

why_exists.title: Why Fleek exists
subText: Our mission is to return the web to its initial vision: open, permissionless, and free of gatekeepers.

Today’s dominance of corporate cloud platforms results in internet censorship, data exploitation, and price gouging. With software at the core of our digital lives, especially in the AI age, we’re creating a future-proof cloud that values freedom and privacy

why_choose.title: Why Fleek?
subText: With Fleek, you’re more than just a customer but a supporter of our mission and values.
Fleek champions your autonomy, respects your data, and empowers you to create without compromise, helping build the free web.

call_to_action.title: Ready to be on Fleek?
subText: Escape Big Cloud and take back control. Fleek offers everything you love about using public cloud platforms, without the constraints of corporate controlled web infrastructure.

templatesPage.title: TEMPLATES
templatesPage.subTitle: Begin with a template
templatesPage.description: Use a template to kick start your application. Pick from just a framework or a full web3 starter kit, the possibilities are limitless.

data.title: Astro Boilerplate
data.description: Start your next project with this Astro boilerplate, designed for seamless development.

data.title: Blogmaker by Vitalik
data.description: Simple and minimal blog template by Vitalik Buterin

data.title: Chess on Fleek
data.description: Chess on Fleek is perfect for developers looking to deploy real-time, interactive applications. This template utilizes Next.js for a fullstck development experience, rendering, ensuring optimal performance with each move.

data.title: Fullstack Nextjs Template
data.description: This is the boilerplate code generated directly from running npx create-next-app. Utilize this template to harness Fleek’s optimized hosting for dynamic and performance-driven web applications.

data.title: Fullstack Nextra on Nextjs
data.description: This is a Next.js application generated with Create Nextra. Nextra is a minimalist, fully customizable documentation site built for easy deployment on Fleek. Perfect for showcasing project documentation, this template uses Next.js to deliver a smooth experience.

data.title: Fumadocs on Fleek
data.description: This is a Next.js application generated with Create Fumadocs. Fumadocs is a minimalist, fully customizable documentation site built for easy deployment on Fleek. Perfect for showcasing project documentation, this template uses Next.js to deliver a smooth, server-rendered experience.

data.title: Gatsby Boilerplate
data.description: Kick off your Gatsby projects with this boilerplate, equipped to handle your development needs.

data.title: Hugo Boilerplate
data.description: This Hugo boilerplate provides a solid foundation for static sites, simplified for a fast turnaround on project setup.

data.title: Next.js Boilerplate
data.description: Begin your Next.js project with confidence using this boilerplate, tailored for efficient development.

data.title: Nuxt Boilerplate
data.description: Accelerate your Nuxt development with this boilerplate, designed to integrate smoothly into your project workflow.

data.title: React Boilerplate
data.description: Initialize your React applications quickly using this ready-to-use boilerplate, optimized for fast setup.

data.title: Remix Boilerplate
data.description: Utilize this Remix boilerplate to structure your projects for an optimal build experience.

data.title: Svelte Boilerplate
data.description: Adopt this Svelte boilerplate to streamline your app development, enhanced for easy integration.

data.title: Vue Boilerplate
data.description: Leverage this Vue.js boilerplate to kickstart your web projects, with pre-configurations for immediate use.
